slides.title: Pattern Recognition
slides.content:
**Pattern Completion:** Find missing figure in sequence
**Strategy:** Look for:
- Rotation (clockwise/anticlockwise)
- Number of elements (increasing/decreasing)
- Shading patterns
- Position changes

slides.title: Figure Classification & Mirror Images
slides.content:
**Figure Classification:** Find odd one out based on shape, size, orientation

**Mirror Images:** How figure appears in mirror
*Tip:* Left â†” Right swap, Top/Bottom stay same

**Embedded Figures:** Find simple shape hidden in complex figure

question.questionText: If a clock shows 3:00, what time will its mirror image show?
question.explanation: In a mirror image, the clock appears reversed. 3:00 becomes 9:00.
